laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.8 mg/dL (Reference range: 1.6 - 2.6 mg/dL; within normal limits)

A 5-mm calcified granuloma in the right lower lobe (unchanged), fibrotic changes in the right lower lobe (unchanged), 7-mm hypodensity within the pancreatic head (unchanged), 9-mm lesion in the pancreatic tail (unchanged), and an area of non-mass-like hypoenhancement in the upper pole of the left kidney (unchanged). Resolution of marked bowel dilatation compared to prior study.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared to the prior study, there has been essential resolution of the marked bowel dilatation.
